DOC.brief_title: Acquisition MI Competence Trough Training Methods Used Swedish County Councils Municipalities
DOC.detailed_description: The basis successful implementation evidence-based treatment routine clinical care quality assessment stage delivery , implementation evaluation . In Swedish county council municipality , Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) train different form content take place part implementation method . Aims : To evaluate extent practitioner acquire retain MI skills different training method use Swedish county council municipality compare format previous study show required long-term acquisition proficiency MI ; train include supervision consist feedback base monitoring practice . Method : In 2013-2014 , 175 practitioner attend MI train five different county council municipality Sweden randomize one study 's three group : ( ) `` Regular training '' ( n= 66 ) , b ) `` Regular training '' follow six individual supervision session monthly interval base behavior count component Motivational Interviewing Treatment Integrity ( MITI ) Code ( n= 67 ) , ( c ) `` Regular training '' follow supervision base behavior count five global dimension MITI ( n= 67 ) . All practitioner record three session : one `` regular training '' , one `` regular training '' one six month training . The practitioner group b c record five additional session conjunction supervision . All supervision record session make phone actor role-playing client . The session assess proficiency MI MIC Lab Karolinska Institute accord Swedish translation MITI 3.1 . Time Frame : The specific time point outcome measure ( Swedish version MITI , version 3.1 . ) assess : 1 . Before county council ' workshop training ( pre-workshop ) . 2 . Directly workshop training ( post-workshop ) . 3 . Six month workshop training ( follow-up ) . = > Since different county council workshop training differ time ( e.g . one four month ) participant different county council follow period seven month ( one + six ) ten month ( four + six ) . The participant randomize two group additional supervision also assess five time post-workshop follow-up assessment ( e.g . every month ) .
DOC.criteria: • Subjects practitioner attend MItraining five different Swedish county council 20132014 . • Practitioners young 18 old 65
